Interface AttachmentDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericAttachmentDAO

    public interface AttachmentDAO
    Author:
    Rafael Steil

    • Method Detail

      • addAttachment

        void addAttachment(Attachment a)
        Adds a new attachment.
        Parameters:
        a - The attacment to add

      • updateAttachment

        void updateAttachment(Attachment a)
        Updates an attachment. Only the file comment is updated.
        Parameters:
        a - The attachment to update

      • removeAttachment

        void removeAttachment(int id,
                    int postId)
        Rovemos an attachment.
        Parameters:
        id - The attachment's id to remove
        postId - the post id

      • selectAttachments

        List selectAttachments(int postId)
        Gets the attachments of some message.
        Parameters:
        postId - The post id associated with the attachments.
        Returns:
        A list where each entry is a net.jforum.entities.Attachment instance.

      • selectAttachmentById

        Attachment selectAttachmentById(int attachId)
        Gets an attachment by its id
        Parameters:
        attachId - The attachment id
        Returns:
        The attachment, or null if no record was found

      • addQuotaLimit

        void addQuotaLimit(QuotaLimit limit)
        Inserts a new quota limit.
        Parameters:
        limit - The data to insert

      • updateQuotaLimit

        void updateQuotaLimit(QuotaLimit limit)
        Updates a quota limit.
        Parameters:
        limit - The data to update

      • removeQuotaLimit

        void removeQuotaLimit(int id)
        Deletes a quota limit
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the quota to remove

      • removeQuotaLimit

        void removeQuotaLimit(String[] ids)
        Removes a set of quota limit.
        Parameters:
        ids - The ids to remove.

      • setGroupQuota

        void setGroupQuota(int groupId,
                 int quotaId)
        Associates a quota limmit to some group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - The group id
        quotaId - The quota id

      • cleanGroupQuota

        void cleanGroupQuota()
        Removes all quotas limits from all groups.

      • selectQuotaLimit

        List selectQuotaLimit()
        Gets all registered quota limits
        Returns:
        A list instance where each entry is a QuotaLimit instance.

      • selectQuotaLimitByGroup

        QuotaLimit selectQuotaLimitByGroup(int groupId)
        Gets the quota associated to some group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - The group id
        Returns:
        A QuotaLimit instance, or null if no records were found.

      • selectGroupsQuotaLimits

        Map selectGroupsQuotaLimits()
        Gets the quota limits of registered groups.
        Returns:
        A map instance where each key is the group id and the value is the quota limit id.

      • addExtensionGroup

        void addExtensionGroup(AttachmentExtensionGroup g)
        Adds a new extension group.
        Parameters:
        g - The data to insert

      • updateExtensionGroup

        void updateExtensionGroup(AttachmentExtensionGroup g)
        Updates some extensin group.
        Parameters:
        g - The data to update

      • removeExtensionGroups

        void removeExtensionGroups(String[] ids)
        Removes a set of extension groups.
        Parameters:
        ids - The ids to remove.

      • selectExtensionGroups

        List selectExtensionGroups()
        Gets all extension groups.
        Returns:
        A list instance where each entry is an AttachmentExtensionGroup instance.

      • extensionsForSecurity

        Map extensionsForSecurity()
        Gets all extensions and its security options, as well from the groups.
        Returns:
        A map instance where the key is the extension name and the value is a Boolean, indicating if the extension can be used in the uploaded files. If there is no entry for a given extension, then it means that it is allowed.

      • addExtension

        void addExtension(AttachmentExtension e)
        Adds a new extension
        Parameters:
        e - The extension to add

      • updateExtension

        void updateExtension(AttachmentExtension e)
        Updates an extension
        Parameters:
        e - The extension to update

      • removeExtensions

        void removeExtensions(String[] ids)
        Removes a set of extensions
        Parameters:
        ids - The ids to remove

      • selectExtensions

        List selectExtensions()
        Gets all registered extensions
        Returns:
        A list instance, where each entry is an AttachmentExtension instance

      • selectExtension

        AttachmentExtension selectExtension(String extension)
        Gets an extension information by the extension's name
        Parameters:
        extension -
        Returns:
        AttachmentExtension

      • isPhysicalDownloadMode

        boolean isPhysicalDownloadMode(int extensionGroupId)
        Gets the download mode by the extension group id
        Parameters:
        extensionGroupId - extension group id
        Returns:
        true = physical download mode; false = inline download mode
